casebody.data:
HOWARD BERRY v. ALFRED RUDOLPH 25 So. (2nd) 207

January Term, 1946

March 12, 1946 En Banc Alvan B. Rowe, for appellant. George 0. Lea, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

The order and judgment appealed from is reversed upon the authority of the opinions and decisions in Croft v. Culbreath, 150 Fla. 60, 6 So. (2nd) 638; Ex parte Earman, 85 Fla. 297, 95 So. 755, and cases therein cited, including the well considered opinion of Mr. Justice LAMAR in Gompers v. Buck Stove and Range Co., 221 U.S. 418 31 S.C. 492; 55 Law ed. 797.

Reversed.

*179CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and BROWN, JJ., concur. SEBRING, J., agrees to conclusion and judgment. THOMAS and ADAMS, JJ., dissent.
